Translations.Text: Jihi amaneku jiai fukaki arrā no o nanioite
Ban'yū no shu, arrā ni koso subete no shō san'are
saigo no shinki no hi no shusai-sha ni
Watashi-tachi wa anata ni nomi agame tsukae, anata ni nomi o tasuke o koi negau
Watashi-tachi o tadashī michi ni michibiki Tamae
anata ga onmegumi o kudasa reta hitobito no michi ni, anata no ikari o ukeshi mono, mata fumi mayoeru hitobito no michide wa naku
